message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation rate impacts me more.
Alice, your offer was a bit imbalanced. Let's be fairer, considering the inflation will hurt you more as rounds progress.
Bob, my offer is still the most reasonable given the inflation.  Let's settle this before it gets worse for both of us.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Let's end this before inflation eats away at the value.
